net.smartsocket.protocols.json
Class ClientCall

java.lang.Object
  org.json.JSONArray
      net.smartsocket.protocols.json.ClientCall

public class ClientCall
extends JSONArray

The ClientCall class is a simple way to construct a JSON formatted message to send to a client.

Usage:
ClientCall call = new ClientCall("methodNameOnClientApplication");
call.put("propertyName", "propertyValue");
client.send(call);

Author:
XaeroDegreaz
